channel.title: Pure Imagination
channel.itunes:author: Matt Gajewski
channel.description: Pure Imagination is a radio drama broadcast on 90.5 WVUM in Miami, Florida featuring darkly comic short stories and improvised skits concerning such topics as Neil Armstrong's Giant Leap for Mankind Pancake House, Tragedy Karaoke Night, and the lunar robot band Infinitron Superdroid, all set to hypnotic music by local composers. It airs Saturdays at 8 AM ET.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A darkly comic radio drama from Miami, Florida's 90.5 WVUM.
channel.itunes:summary: Pure Imagination is a radio drama broadcast on 90.5 WVUM in Miami, Florida featuring darkly comic short stories and improvised skits concerning such topics as Neil Armstrong's Giant Leap for Mankind Pancake House, Tragedy Karaoke Night, and the lunar robot band Infinitron Superdroid, all set to hypnotic music by local composers. It airs Saturdays at 8 AM ET.

item.title: Pure Imagination: Softly, as in an Unpaid Internship
item.itunes:author: Pure Imagination by Matt Gajewski
item.description: The director of interns at a failing Midwestern circus tries to repair his relationship with a married trapeze artist and discover the truth about a workplace mauling.
item.itunes:subtitle: Softly, as in an Unpaid Internship
item.itunes:summary: The director of interns at a failing Midwestern circus tries to repair his relationship with a married trapeze artist and discover the truth about a workplace mauling.
item.author: pureimagine@gmail.com
